data.message: Dre is looking sharp man . would like to ask Slim for a favor but he aint got time for us little people,  I'm a fan but i'm a fan of music period,  I don't have a favorite type of music but music is art and i am all about art,.  would be so cool to have you host an event for my strip club, even more so if Dre would.  My dancers would go nuts if Kendick was our host they love that song Humble.  it would be a humble gesture to even get a private message but I wont hold my breathe.  damn Em you look so different , hard to recognize I'd still do you though lol . I know this post wont even get seen by any of ya in the photo I just wanted try anyways .  God Bless
